name: quicklime production, milled, loose | quicklime, milled, loose | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11418/documentation

This dataset represents the production of milled quicklime in Quebec (Canada), from quicklime in pieces;;The only quicklime producer in Quebec provided the electricity consumption for quicklime milling.;;Infrastructure data was extrapolated from "quicklime production, milled, loose, GLO 2000-2002" ecoinvent dataset: The value of the infrastructure is normalized with a annual production capacity of about 23'000 tons of product per year. The estimated lifespan of the machines is 25 years. There are no significant dust emissions as a dust control system is installed. ;;Quicklime is used for acid neutralization, SO2 absorption, sludge stabilization or other industrial alkali applications.

From quicklime in pieces.

This activity ends with the milled quicklime, at the plant gate.

This dataset includes the processes: crushing, milling , filtering (cyclone), dedusting, and storing. One part of the total heating energy for "production" and "administration" is included. Equipment included in the infrastructure: 1 crusher, 1 roller mill, 1 plant for dedusting, 1cyclone, and 1 small silo.

This dataset does not include the electricity consumption for dedusting and filtering. This energy was included in the "quicklime, in pieces, loose, Québec".
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Quebec data are from the only company that produces quicklime on the territory. Unavalable data were extrapolated based on the GLO dataset exchanges. Uncertainties adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
A weighted average of the three quicklime production plants in Quebec was used.
When no information available, GLO exchanges have been used as proxy for Quebec. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
 
See Geography and Technolgy fields for details.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Information provided by the only Quebec producer

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=CH
Pulverized limestone (lime, milled, loose) includes all products which are made by grinding and screening industrial grade limestone.

These products are used in a variety of applications including:
- Rock Dust - used to suppress coal dust explosions in the coal industry.
- Agricultural - used to neutralize soil acidity, increase plant nutrients, increase organic matter, increase soil organisms, and increase trace elements. 
- Exhaust Gas Scrubbers - used in industrial and power plants.
- Scrubber Reagent - used in circulating fluidized bed boilers as a reagent material for sulfur removal.
- Roofing Materials - used as a filler in asphalt shingles.
- Drilling Mud Additives - used as an essential component in drilling mud.
- Glass Stone - used as a primary ingredient in the glass making process.
- Feed Supplements - used to provide essential minerals for the animal feed industry.
